title: Cactus groups and Lusztig's asymptotic algebra
abstract:
We construct a morphism from the cactus group associated with a Coxeter group
to the group of invertible elements of Lusztig's asymptotic algebra. This
relates to the cactus group action on elements of Coxeter groups defined by
Losev and Bonnaf\'e and we propose a conjecture on how to fully recover those
actions.
